name: Spiritlands
description: Spiritlands is a game of building and survival. Turn a single tent into a bustling network of towns and cities. Grow and fight to survive, and become the leader you dream to be with near endless possibilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
